value:
Hmm... Why can't I find... This seems
like the place... Err... Ugh! Did I lose
Kris again?!

After assisting Prince Marth's escape,
I just kept on helping the knights.
I had my reasons, of course...

Ohmigosh! Were you behind the
target I was firing at? Be careful!
You're lucky I'm a good shot...

What a big yawn! Up late, were ya?
I'm a bit sleepy myself, to tell ya the
truth... Time for a quick nap?

Oh, smelled the stew, did ya? Well,
you'll only have to wait a bit longer.
It's just about ready.

Heya! Sorry for botherin' ya, but
I've got this message for ya from
your pal $Nf!

Whew! Feelin' good! At this rate,
things'll go well for us!

Hmph. My body doesn't want to
cooperate today... Guess I'll just
have to train it some more!

Ah, geez. Now I've stepped in it...
I really am such a klutz...

You're going to trust me with this?
Aww, yay! Thank you so much!

Hey there, I'm Norne! I may not look
like much, but I know my way around
a bow. Say, uh...is Prince Marth here?

Wh-wha— Oh! I thought I was a goner
for sure... Thanks for the help! Seems
you're always helpin' me out...$k$pY'know, I've been thinkin' that you
remind me of Kris, and...I think all
your help might be the main reason.$k$pWell, that MAY be what it is... But
I don't want it to be you who always
helps me... Lemme return the favor!$k$pI know! When all this fighting is over,
I'll take you to visit my village! I think
you'll feel right at home there...$k$pAnd when we get there, I'll make ya,
hands down, the best meal you've
ever eaten—believe you me!
たあっ
いきます！
きゃあっ！
もうだめ…！
No lollygagging!
This'll be quick work!
Pinned ya down!
For Altea!
Heh... Oops...
Ehehe
I'm Norne! Pleasure to meetcha!
WAAH! ...Wh-what's with the face? Of COURSE you scared me!
Aw, geez. Wish I weren't so clumsy... Ah! SEE?! I'm droppin' things all over the place!
The village I'm from is just down the road from where Kris grew up—we even played together as children!
I was making a run for it when we ran into Prince Marth. I figured he could use the help, so I stuck around!
I thought that...if I joined the army...maybe I'd be able to see Kris again one day...
You'd be surprised what I can handle. I'll give you everything I've got!
Why, of course!
That so?
It'll be just a moment!
